page.description: Demonstrates a simple mobile app that supports 'disconnected' mode.
page.discussion: This template demonstrates a simple mobile application with offline support. The application works against the sample Northwind database, which ships with Alpha Anywhere.
page.note: Before you can run a component created with this template, you must first make a named connection string called *[Northwind]*. See the comment in the UX Component for more information on how to create a named connection string for the sample Northwind Access database.
